name: Tackle
description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target.

name: Scratch
description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target.

name: Pound
description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail or foreleg.

name: Headbutt
description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target.

name: Body Slam
description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight.

name: Take Down
description: A reckless, full-body charge attack.

name: Double-Edge
description: A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target.

name: Hyper Beam
description: The target is attacked with a powerful beam. The user can't move on the next turn.

name: Quick Attack
description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible.

name: ExtremeSpeed
description: The user charges the target at blinding speed.

name: Slash
description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades.

name: Strength
description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

name: Return
description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

name: Facade
description: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

name: Explosion
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion.

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion.

name: Ember
description: The target is attacked with small flames.

name: Fire Spin
description: The target becomes trapped within a fierce vortex of fire.

name: Flamethrower
description: The target is scorched with an intense blast of fire.

name: Fire Blast
description: The target is attacked with an intense blast of all-consuming fire.

name: Fire Punch
description: The target is punched with a fiery fist.

name: Overheat
description: The user attacks the target at full power. The attack's recoil lowers the user's Sp. Atk.

name: Blaze Kick
description: The user launches a kick with blazing force.

name: Water Gun
description: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

name: Bubble
description: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the opposing Pokemon.

name: Water Pulse
description: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water.

name: Surf
description: The user attacks everything around it by swamping them with a huge wave.

name: Hydro Pump
description: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

name: Waterfall
description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

name: Aqua Tail
description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

name: ThunderShock
description: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target.

name: Thunderbolt
description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

name: Thunder
description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target.

name: Thunder Punch
description: The target is punched with an electrified fist.

name: Spark
description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target.

name: Volt Tackle
description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target.

name: Vine Whip
description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines.

name: Razor Leaf
description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pokemon.

name: Solar Beam
description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light, then blasts a bundled beam on the next turn.

name: Giga Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack.

name: Leaf Blade
description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target.

name: Bullet Seed
description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times.

name: Petal Dance
description: The user attacks by scattering petals for two to three turns.

name: Ice Beam
description: The target is struck with an icy-cold beam of energy.

name: Blizzard
description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pokemon.

name: Ice Punch
description: The target is punched with an icy fist.

name: Aurora Beam
description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam.

name: Powder Snow
description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow.

name: Karate Chop
description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop.

name: Low Kick
description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over.

name: Cross Chop
description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed.

name: Brick Break
description: The user attacks with a swift chop.

name: Sky Uppercut
description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

name: Focus Blast
description: The user heightens its mental focus and unleashes its power.

name: Mach Punch
description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed.

name: Poison Sting
description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger.

name: Sludge
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target.

name: Sludge Bomb
description: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target.

name: Poison Jab
description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison.

name: Earthquake
description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pokemon around it.

name: Dig
description: The user burrows into the ground, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Mud-Slap
description: The user hurls mud in the target's face.

name: Earth Power
description: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power.

name: Wing Attack
description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide.

name: Fly
description: The user flies up on the first turn, then strikes on the next turn.

name: Aerial Ace
description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

name: Drill Peck
description: A corkscrewing attack that strikes the target with a sharp beak.

name: Brave Bird
description: The user tucks in its wings and charges at a low altitude.

name: Confusion
description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force.

name: Psybeam
description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray.

name: Psychic
description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force.

name: Dream Eater
description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused.

name: Bug Bite
description: The user bites the target.

name: Signal Beam
description: The user attacks with a sinister beam of light.

name: X-Scissor
description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws.

name: Megahorn
description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target.

name: Rock Throw
description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target.

name: Rock Slide
description: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pokemon.

name: Stone Edge
description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones.

name: Rock Tomb
description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed.

name: Shadow Ball
description: The user hurls a shadowy blob at the target.

name: Shadow Claw
description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows.

name: Shadow Punch
description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

name: Lick
description: The target is licked with a long tongue.

name: Dragon Claw
description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

name: Dragon Breath
description: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage.

name: Outrage
description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns.

name: Dragon Pulse
description: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

name: Bite
description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs.

name: Crunch
description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs.

name: Dark Pulse
description: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts.

name: Pursuit
description: The power of this attack move is doubled if it's used on a target that's switching out.

name: Iron Tail
description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail.

name: Metal Claw
description: The target is raked with steel claws.

name: Steel Wing
description: The target is hit with wings of steel.

name: Meteor Mash
description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor.

name: Flash Cannon
description: The user gathers all its light energy and releases it at once.

name: Cut
description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

name: Rock Smash
description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense.

name: Flash
description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

name: Dive
description: The user dives underwater on the first turn, then attacks on the next turn.

name: Growl
description: The user growls in an endearing way.

name: Tail Whip
description: The user wags its tail cutely.

name: Leer
description: The user gives opposing Pokemon an intimidating leer.

name: String Shot
description: Opposing Pokemon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth.

name: Sand Attack
description: Sand is hurled in the target's face.

name: Smokescreen
description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink.

name: Swords Dance
description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack.

name: Dragon Dance
description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance.

name: Agility
description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster.

name: Calm Mind
description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit.

name: Bulk Up
description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body.

name: Iron Defense
description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron.

name: Amnesia
description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns.

name: Nasty Plot
description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts.

name: Growth
description: The user's body grows all at once.

name: Harden
description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body.

name: Defense Curl
description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots.

name: Withdraw
description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell.

name: Thunder Wave
description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

name: Toxic
description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned.

name: Poison Powder
description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust.

name: Sleep Powder
description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust.

name: Stun Spore
description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder.

name: Spore
description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

name: Hypnosis
description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

name: Sing
description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice.

name: Will-O-Wisp
description: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

name: Confuse Ray
description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that causes confusion.

name: Supersonic
description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body.

name: Recover
description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

name: Rest
description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

name: Synthesis
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Moonlight
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Soft-Boiled
description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

name: Leech Seed
description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

name: Protect
description: This move enables the user to protect itself from all attacks.

name: Substitute
description: The user creates a substitute for itself using some of its HP.

name: Roar
description: The target is scared off and a different Pokemon is dragged out.

name: Whirlwind
description: The target is blown away and a different Pokemon is dragged out.

name: Rain Dance
description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns.

name: Sunny Day
description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns.

name: Sandstorm
description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants.

name: Hail
description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns.

name: Light Screen
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks.

name: Reflect
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks.

name: Rapid Spin
description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed.

name: Gust
description: A gust of wind is whipped up by wings and launched at the target.

name: Twister
description: The user whips up a vicious tornado.

name: Wrap
description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and squeeze the target.

name: Bind
description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target.

name: Absorb
description: A nutrient-draining attack.

name: Mega Drain
description: A nutrient-draining attack.

name: Leech Life
description: The user drains the target's blood.

name: Fury Attack
description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times.

name: Fury Swipes
description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times.

name: Peck
description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

name: Night Shade
description: The user makes the target see a frightening mirage. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: Seismic Toss
description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

name: Self-Destruct
description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion.

name: Tri Attack
description: The user strikes with a simultaneous three-beam attack.

name: Mud Shot
description: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target.

name: Ancient Power
description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power.

name: Flail
description: The user flails about aimlessly. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

name: Reversal
description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.
